name: Sentimentum
description:
When caught in your own wandering thoughts, the twisted and distorted past creeps in and consumes you. Defend yourself with what little tools you have from the horrors of an older era. 

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

 Mouse 1 - Fire

 Mouse 2 - Reverse Time

Credits:

Programming: BroTheWanderer and dwagon6

Art: turnipboys and vacueye

Audio: iRGASM

Design: Awesome3475
